statements: SELECT * FROM space_missions;
SELECT mission_name, destination FROM space_missions WHERE mission_success = TRUE;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM space_missions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM space_missions WHERE destination IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM space_missions WHERE mission_success = TRUE;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date, destination, mission_success FROM space_missions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT mission_name, destination FROM space_missions WHERE mission_success = true;
SELECT * FROM space_missions WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT mission_name, destination FROM space_missions WHERE destination = 'Mars';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, mission_success FROM space_missions ORDER BY launch_date ASC, mission_success DESC;
SELECT * FROM space_missions;
SELECT mission_name, mission_date FROM space_missions ORDER BY mission_date DESC;
SELECT mission_name, launch_site FROM space_missions WHERE mission_status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT mission_name, launch_site, mission_status FROM space_missions WHERE mission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT m.member_name, m.role, s.mission_name FROM mission_members m JOIN space_missions s ON m.mission_id = s.mission_id;
SELECT * FROM space_missions WHERE mission_status = 'Success'
SELECT mission_name, launch_site FROM space_missions WHERE launch_site = 'Kennedy Space Center'
SELECT mission_name, mission_date FROM space_missions WHERE mission_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY mission_date DESC
SELECT mission_name, launch_site, mission_status FROM space_missions WHERE mission_status = 'Ongoing' AND launch_site = 'Baikonur Cosmodrome'
SELECT space_missions.mission_name, mission_members.member_name, mission_members.role FROM space_missions INNER JOIN mission_members ON space_missions.mission_id = mission_members.mission_id
SELECT * FROM space_missions;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM space_missions;
SELECT * FROM spacex_launches WHERE launch_success = true;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM space_missions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT astronaut_name, astronaut_dob FROM astronauts WHERE mission_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM space_missions
SELECT mission_name, launch_date FROM space_missions WHERE mission_status='Successful'
SELECT astronaut_name FROM astronauts WHERE astronaut_dob < '1990-01-01'
SELECT s.mission_name, l.rocket_name FROM space_missions s JOIN spacex_launches l ON s.mission_id = l.mission_id
SELECT a.astronaut_name, s.mission_name FROM astronauts a JOIN space_missions s ON a.mission_id = s.mission_id
SELECT * FROM SpaceMissions;
SELECT mission_name, mission_date, mission_destination FROM SpaceMissions WHERE mission_success = TRUE;
SELECT data_type, data_value FROM MissionData WHERE mission_id = 3 ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT spacecraft_name, spacecraft_type FROM Spacecraft WHERE spacecraft_status = 'Active';
SELECT crew_name, crew_role, crew_status FROM MissionCrew WHERE crew_status = 'Available';
SELECT * FROM SpaceMissions;
SELECT mission_name, mission_destination FROM SpaceMissions WHERE mission_success = TRUE;
SELECT mission_name, mission_date FROM SpaceMissions ORDER BY mission_date DESC;
SELECT crew_name, crew_role FROM MissionCrew WHERE crew_status = 'Active';
SELECT spacecraft_name, spacecraft_type FROM Spacecraft WHERE mission_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM space_missions;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, destination FROM space_missions WHERE mission_success = TRUE;
SELECT astronaut_name, nationality, missions_completed FROM astronauts ORDER BY missions_completed DESC;
SELECT craft_name, manufacturer, launch_date, status FROM spacecrafts WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT m.mission_name, i.image_url, c.craft_name FROM space_missions m JOIN mission_images i ON m.mission_id = i.mission_id JOIN spacecrafts c ON i.craft_id = c.craft_id ORDER BY m.launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM space_missions ORDER BY launch_date DESC, mission_name ASC, mission_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT mission_name, destination, mission_success FROM space_missions WHERE mission_success = true;
SELECT craft_name, manufacturer, status FROM spacecrafts WHERE status = 'Active' OR status = 'In Transit';
SELECT astronaut_name, nationality, missions_completed FROM astronauts WHERE missions_completed >= 5 ORDER BY missions_completed DESC;

SELECT m.mission_id, m.mission_name, mt.event_date, mt.event_description, a.astronaut_name FROM space_missions m JOIN missions_timeline mt ON m.mission_id = mt.mission_id JOIN astronauts a ON mt.astronaut_id = a.astronaut_id ORDER BY mt.event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
